thread.title: The direct debit rule that could leave you with bank fees
thread.title_full: The direct debit rule that could leave you with bank fees

author: Sophie Christie
title: The direct debit rule that could leave you with bank fees
text: The direct debit rule that could leave you with bank fees A couple incurred charges on a credit card after their bank cancelled their payments without warning Steve and Helen Lord were shocked to find that their direct debit had been cancelled due to dormancy Photo: BNPS
